activities: Exelis will use and otherwise process EU Personal Information in the United States for various purposes, including:  Workflow management, such as assigning, managing and administering projects; compensation, including stock plan administration, compensation analysus and other company recognition programs; Job grading activities; Performance management; Organization development and succession planning; Benefits and personnel administration including bonuses; Helpdesk and IT support services; Litigation evaluation, prosecution and defense; Compliance investigations; Diversity and Inclusion initiatives; Shareholder management; Restructuring; Emergency contacts and services.
personaldata: On and off-line data to include HR data.
recoursemech: Data protection authorities located in the European Union or their authorized representatives.
